tool_description: Processes and optimizes product images for various display formats, including resizing, compression, and quality enhancement.

image_urls.description: URLs of source images to process

output_formats.description: Required output formats: thumbnail, medium, large, zoom

quality_level.description: Image quality setting: low, medium, high, or ultra

error_messages: Invalid image URL: Ensure all URLs are accessible and point to valid image files
Unsupported format: Use formats from [thumbnail, medium, large, zoom]
Invalid quality level: Use one of [low, medium, high, ultra]
Processing failed: Check image format compatibility and file size limits
usage: Provide image_urls array and specify required output_formats; optionally set quality_level and enable background_removal for enhanced processing.

processed_images.description: URLs of processed images in requested formats

processing_status.description: Overall processing result: success, partial, or failed

file_sizes.description: File sizes in KB for each processed image

failed_images.description: URLs of images that failed to process
